name: Caramel Corn
author: Donna Essner
instructions: Combine brown sugar, margarine, corn syrup and salt in sauce pan and bring to boil. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat, beat baking soda in vigorously. Stir in nuts. Stir in nuts. Place popcorn in a large shallow pan, pour caramel mixture over popcorn. Mix until popcorn is coated evenly with mixture. Bake at 200Â° for 1 hour. Stir every 15 minutes. When cool, break up into smaller pieces.
